channel.title: CVE Feed for Reolink -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Reolink -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-25169|2024-09-16T22:15:58.929Z -- reolink -- rlc-4xx%20series
item.description: The affected Reolink P2P products do not sufficiently protect data transferred between the local device and Reolink servers. This can allow an attacker to access sensitive information, such as camera feeds.

item.title: CVE-2020-25173|2024-09-16T20:47:12.070Z -- reolink -- rlc-4xx%20series
item.description: An attacker with local network access can obtain a fixed cryptography key which may allow for further compromise of Reolink P2P cameras outside of local network access

item.title: CVE-2021-40405|2024-09-16T22:19:41.559Z -- reolink -- rlc-410w
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the cgiserver.cgi Upgrade API functionality of Reolink RLC-410W v3.0.0.136_20121102. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to a reboot. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-44354|2024-09-16T17:54:42.213Z -- reolink -- rlc-410w
item.description: Multiple denial of service vulnerabilities exist in the cgiserver.cgi JSON command parser functionality of Reolink RLC-410W v3.0.0.136_20121102. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to a reboot. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
